pr_title: SOLR-14702: Remove Master and Slave from Code Base and Docs (8.x)

timeline.message:
SOLR-14702: Remove oppressive language (part1) (#1711)

Replace references to "master" and "slave" with "leader" and "follower"
SOLR-14702: doFetch reads legacy parameters too

timeline.bodyText: I left this intentionally using the new parameters because this configuration is only read locally
timeline.author: tflobbe

replies.bodyText: left intentionally — what are you saying?
replies.author: MarcusSorealheis

replies.bodyText: It should be left intentionally. It comes from the leader, right?
replies.author: MarcusSorealheis

replies.bodyText: For 8.x branches, every time we set a parameter or configuration (for requests, etc) we use the legacy names. In this particular case, I'm using the new parameters even for setting, and the reason is that this is a configuration that is set and read locally only. The TLOG/PULL replicas create this to create their replication process.
replies.author: tflobbe
